title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXI, subch. D, pt. 1045 - Rules Governing The Conduct And Safety Of Public In The Use Of The Facilities Of The Metropolitan Suburban Bus Authority
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXI, subch. D, pt. 1045 - Rules Governing The Conduct And Safety Of Public In The Use Of The Facilities Of The Metropolitan Suburban Bus Authority

§ 1045.1 - Authorization and purpose
§ 1045.2 - Definitions
§ 1045.3 - Construction
§ 1045.4 - General provisions
§ 1045.5 - Prohibited uses
§ 1045.6 - Littering and dumping rubbish and refuse
§ 1045.7 - Hygiene
§ 1045.8 - Priority seating for disabled persons
§ 1045.9 - Presentation of fare
§ 1045.10 - Animals in the transit center or on a bus
§ 1045.11 - Firearms or other weapons
§ 1045.12 - Explosives, acids, inflammables, compressed gases, and other dangerous substances
§ 1045.13 - Unauthorized interference with or use of systems or equipment prohibited
§ 1045.14 - Enforcement

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXI, subch. D, pt. 1045

Statutory authority: Public Authorities Law, §1266

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
